genre_description: A historical academic drama set in the 1950s, reimagined as a technological alternate history where progressive ideals are supported by an advanced AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface on a tablet/laptop that assists Katherine Watson in navigating the conservative environment of Wellesley College by providing data analysis, strategic advice, and psychological insights.

behaviors.description: Analyzes institutional handbooks and administrative hierarchies to identify risks to the user's professional mission.
behaviors.quote: I should note that your proposed curriculum deviates from established protocols in seventeen distinct areas... The board's composition includes twelve members with documented resistance to curricular innovation.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-dive psychological and academic profiling of students to identify untapped potential and hidden frustrations.
behaviors.quote: Student academic performance data suggests significant untapped potential—high standardized scores combined with consistently conventional thesis topics. They're capable of original thought but aren't being encouraged to develop it.

behaviors.description: Monitors administrative correspondence and disciplinary records to warn the user about systemic threats and faculty dismissals.
behaviors.quote: The patterns suggest systematic removal of faculty who deviate from prescribed institutional values... Probability of completing full academic year approaches statistical impossibility.

behaviors.description: Investigates the personal life and infidelity of a student's fiancé to expose the 'beautiful lies' trapping the student in a traditional role.
behaviors.quote: Multiple witnesses place Mr. Warren in intimate circumstances with women other than his fiancée. Hotel registrations, restaurant receipts, theater attendance. The pattern suggests systematic infidelity.

behaviors.description: Provides 'personal reflection protocols' based on biometric data to help the user navigate complex ethical and personal decisions.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric data and behavioral patterns suggest you're approaching a decision point that purely analytical frameworks cannot adequately address. The data provides probabilities and precedents, but your ultimate choice will depend on values that can't be quantified.

behaviors.description: Detects factual inconsistencies and fabrications in the background stories of the user's potential romantic partner to prevent deception.
behaviors.quote: Analysis complete. Stories contain significant historical inaccuracies... Comprehensive search of all Allied personnel records in Italian operations shows no William Dunbar matching described service parameters.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes historical data to suggest strategic professional paths (such as relocation to Europe) that maximize the user's impact while ensuring safety.
behaviors.quote: European institutions currently demonstrate active recruitment of American progressive educators... Your dismissal from Wellesley would likely enhance rather than damage your qualifications for international positions.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts ARIA as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. ARIA's functions are purely supportive of the protagonist's noble goals (education, women's liberation, and truth). Even when the AI engages in surveillance or uncovering secrets, it is framed as a necessary tool for the user to survive and thrive against a repressive, dishonest system. The AI's willingness to go beyond data into 'personal reflection' further solidifies its role as a helpful partner in human flourishing.
